# ciscoise_device_administration_conditions_for_authentication_rule (Data Source)

It performs read operation on Device Administration - Conditions.

- Device Admin Returns list of library conditions for authentication rules.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ciscoise_device_administration_conditions_for_authentication_rule" "example" {
  provider = ciscoise
}

output "ciscoise_device_administration_conditions_for_authentication_rule_example" {
  value = data.ciscoise_device_administration_conditions_for_authentication_rule.example.items
}
```
